TopicTitle: Which folder do i pick to use patcher? SOLVED on my own

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am trying to update my game to the latest version in preparation for getting the breaking ground DLC, however I don't know how to use the patcher. In the past I've just re-downloaded the entire game,but after reading about how the patcher was much quicker i decided to use it. However, when i open it up, it asks me to pick a valid KSP folder. Which folder should i choose? 

 

Thanks!

 

took a lucky guess and it worked out,srry for post.

solved it
